tool_description: Gets news links about the Russian Ukraine War
name: Russian Ukraine news
title: Russian Ukraine news

api_list.name: Get individual Russian Ukraine News
api_list.description: Get individual Russian Ukraine News from a specific resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-ukraine-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/politico"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-ukraine-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-ukraine-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-ukraine-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Russian Ukraine News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about the Russian invasion of Ukraine
